posts.post_content:
If you're stuck against [Iona, Shield of Emeria](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Iona, Shield of Emeria), you can channel the everloving snot out of her.  
  
That alone makes ol' Arashi a 5/5 in my book.

posts.post_content:
Arashi = 嵐 (storm), but also 荒らし (forum troll)  
I guess we found out why it doesn't have reach: it's trolling everyone who thinks it should.  
But then if it's a troll, why doesn't it regenerate??

Posted By: tenkaze (11/22/2010 10:47:33 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Very cool. This is a card I've used and recommend the use of. Many green decks, especially in multiplayer, have big problems with flyers. A live Arashi is screaming "don't you dare!" while one in hand can just hurricane them all away. The versatility makes him more useful, in my opinion, than Hurricane for just getting rid of flyers.

Posted By: HairlessThoctar (5/19/2010 6:45:34 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: It doesn't have reach because it pretty much doesn't need it. Just leave it untapped, block a ground creature with it and tap it for its ability to kill an attacking flying creature. Besides, they were trying to make it a pair with [Jiwari, the Earth Aflame](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jiwari, the Earth Aflame). They'd have to give Jiwari something to equate reach on a creature of his type.
posts.html:
It doesn't have reach because it pretty much doesn't need it. Just leave it untapped, block a ground creature with it and tap it for its ability to kill an attacking flying creature. Besides, they were trying to make it a pair with Jiwari, the Earth Aflame. They'd have to give Jiwari something to equate reach on a creature of his type.
